name: Shadow World (Marco McGowan)
description:
Controls:

Keyboard (Player 1 Only)

WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump
TAB - Switch player (Singleplayer Only)
G - Pickup / Drop Box
P - Pause

Controller (Player 2 Only)

(Menu / Start) - Drop In/Out
D-Pad / Left Stick - Movement
(A) - Jump
(B) - Pickup / Drop Box
